mapper.select: SELECT N.NOTICE_NO,N.NOTICE_TITLE,U.USERS_NAME FROM NOTICE N JOIN USERS U ON U.USERS_ID = N.USERS_ID ORDER BY N.NOTICE_NO ASC
SELECT U.USERS_NAME, N.NOTICE_TITLE, N.NOTICE_CONTENT, NOTICE_CREATION_DATE FROM Notice N JOIN USERS U ON U.USERS_ID = N.USERS_ID WHERE N.NOTICE_NO = #{noticeNo}
SELECT POST_NO, TITLE, CREATION_DATE FROM POST WHERE USERS_ID = #{userId} ORDER BY CREATION_DATE DESC
